Preterit.turoyo: hǧəmmeʕal u=malko, liya w-l-a=greʕ-ayḏa, msəkkeyaṣiro 69; 24/173; mḥeleraġletaḥt u=gawo d-i=sisto, hǧəmleaʕla, maʕleleḥəsdiḏe ‘’; 24/215 [MT]; ʕumumkulleqayimi b-ḥubo b-šayno, rawixiʕal-as=səsy-aṯṯe <…> w-hǧəmmeʕal-ad=dəžmən i=naqqa d-mqadamle u=abr-ayḏe <…> w-b-ġaḏ̣abhǧəmlerišayye, w-grəšle u=sayfo, mqadamle-lənhǧəmleʕal i=oḏaḥretomofaqle u=ḥmor-awo w-dfəʕlelawġul l-u=diwan
translations: ‘He ran into another room, brought out the donkey and forced him into the divan’ 84/53 [MT];

Infectum.turoyo: i=šawṯo kula, u=ḥa d-lat-le maye k-hoǧəm l-ab=bote d-kəttemaye 20/15; hano u=moro d-i=baxčamaləmle a=greʕ-ayḏe, aṯən d-huǧmiaʕlayye ‘’; 24/170; omár-way-no ha ʕIdogd-oṯe g-hoǧamli, w ha gd-oṯe-li ʕIdoməftakalle d-hoǧəmaʕlayyeḥatta d-qoṭəl a=greʕe w-hiya w-u=gawro ‘’; 24/205; uṯetukulxu d-hužminaʕal u=ʕadu d-xulṣina m-i=ḏ̣əlmiy-ayḏe, m-i=ʕubudiy-ayḏe

translations: ‘When we get up on the roof of Mar Dodo of
and fire (our) rifles, you attack the village from the ring (around it)’ 71/92;
